constantValues: The root entity for a portal blog.

definitions.description: The root entity for a portal blog.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Blog' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
arguments.name: stateCode_display

members.name: stateCode

constantValues: Shows whether the blog is active or inactive. Inactive records are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

members.description: Shows whether the blog is active or inactive. Inactive records are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'Blog' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
arguments.name: statusCode_display

members.name: name

constantValues: Shows the name or title of the blog.

members.description: Shows the name or title of the blog.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'PageTemplate' adds the 'archiveTemplateId' attribute below to the 'Blog' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: archiveTemplateId

constantValues: Shows the page template to be used to render the archive page (for example, posts by date, tags, and so on) of the blog.

value.description: Shows the page template to be used to render the archive page (for example, posts by date, tags, and so on) of the blog.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'PageTemplate' adds the 'homeTemplateId' attribute below to the 'Blog' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: homeTemplateId

constantValues: Shows the page template to be used to render the home/main page of the Blog.

value.description: Shows the page template to be used to render the home/main page of the Blog.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'PageTemplate' adds the 'postTemplateId' attribute below to the 'Blog' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: postTemplateId

constantValues: Shows the page template to be used to render an individual Blog Post belonging to the Blog.

value.description: Shows the page template to be used to render an individual Blog Post belonging to the Blog.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'commentPolicy_display' is added to the 'Blog' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'commentPolicy'
arguments.name: commentPolicy_display

members.name: commentPolicy

constantValues: Specifies the post comment policy to be used by this Blog.

members.description: Specifies the post comment policy to be used by this Blog.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'WebPage' adds the 'parentPageId' attribute below to the 'Blog' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: parentPageId

constantValues: Shows the parent webpage associated with this blog, denoting its place in the website site map.

value.description: Shows the parent webpage associated with this blog, denoting its place in the website site map.

members.name: partialURL

constantValues: Shows the URL path fragment to be used to build a URL for this blog.

members.description: Shows the URL path fragment to be used to build a URL for this blog.

members.name: summary

constantValues: A descriptive summary of the Blog.

members.description: A descriptive summary of the Blog.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Website' adds the 'websiteid' attribute below to the 'Blog' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: websiteid

constantValues: Shows the website associated with the blog.

value.description: Shows the website associated with the blog.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'WebsiteLanguage' adds the 'blogPostLanguageId' attribute below to the 'Blog' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: blogPostLanguageId

constantValues: Option to make blog posts language specific

value.description: Option to make blog posts language specific
